DOC.brief_summary: The study is being conducted to determine the maximum tolerated dose, overall safety and tolerability profile, and pharmacokinetic profile of CP-751,871 and sunitinib when given in combination with advanced solid tumors.
DOC.brief_title: Study Of CP-751,871 In Combination With Sunitinib In Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: The study was closed to enrollment on 14 Jan 2011 and terminated secondary to excessive screen failure rate and for business reasons associated with Pfizer's business decision to stop development of the figitumumab compound. Safety concerns did not contribute to the decision to terminate this clinical trial.
